alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 10:13PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN SAN MIGUEL, SOUTHEASTERN SANTA FE, WEST CENTRAL GUADALUPE AND EASTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM MDT... At 1013 PM MDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Lamy to near Clines Corners to 6 miles east of Willard. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Encino, Villanueva, Villanueva State Park, Ribera, Clines Corners, Sena and San Jose. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 214 and 240. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 314 and 324. Highway 285 between Mile Markers 223 and 265. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 222 and 259. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands
